snippet.title: Fear of Hot Water Ghost | First Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The survival horror action-adventure game "Fear of Hot Water Ghost" will be officially released in April 2025.
STEAM : [https://store.steampowered.com/app/3558300]

"Watch out! The terrifying hot water ghost is here!" A survival horror action-adventure where you escape from a nightmarish city that has suddenly gone mad.
